CHAT.comment: this is the only transcript for which the audio is missing

Spencer St. apt.; an extra tape made because S was so talkative; includes first Ball episode as well as Crocodile and Hyena stories; S has several V+Obj constructions; imitates D saying V+Obj constructions

u.a: an' the- we don't need a ^tape right now
butchr ^so talkative an' ^good that Daddy's gonna ^take this
take this ol' junk ^tape an' see if we can re^cord on'it
5 sec during which the ball bounces and S breathes audibly
loud highpitched laugh , overlaps D's next utt
9 sec silence except for a small sound from S at 1:42
ball bounces at the same time; 2 sec
ball bounces several more times; 3 sec
2 sec; S makes effort sound at 3:03; more silence
ball bounces away; 6 sec silence; D is sitting in the rocking chair
4 sec; S pounding or slapping D's chest
Ben is Seth's much older half-brother; 3 .5 sec
bouncing J up and down; 1 sec
note negotiation of meaning taking place here; 2 sec
an'-- the ^crocodile-- took some'a the ^mangos home to'is ^wife
a part D knows S knows; 2 sec pause
sounds more like "hurry up and go on" than "yes , I'll help"
an' the monkey ^jumped off the crocodile's ^back
an' the ^monkey an' the ^crocodile were- ^bes' friends f'r ^ever after
d'you want the ^rabbit an' the hy^ena
tmorrow we're going on a ^long journey to a ^far ^country
^where do all the old ^clos go when they wear ^out
1 .5 sec: pregnant pause , but not DOT intonation
slowly , giving S a chance to jump in; 1 sec
S didn't wait for the dot , he just jumped right in
a little faster , and a little sloppier than before
probably S doesn't know so says something else
^why're ^all the little rocks on top of all the ^big rocks
firmly; losing patience - he knows S knows; 1 more sec
S exhales the whole thing very rapidly , so it comes out sounding full of air
never heard him use "please" this way before; it's very faint and overlaps D
joining in with S , but not willing to stop the story
imi^tation is how the ^frogs lost their ^tails
^I don't wanna te'-- I'on't ^have any more stories
S doesn't seem to expect a story , but it's almost an automatic response to a story ending; 2 sec
playing with cover of tape recorder
3 sec; sound of one snap; D wants to protect the tape recorder
pronouncing it like he thinks S does; loudly
echoing S; 2 sec; now they're in the bed+room
challenging S to get up , too; 6 sec , can hear effort sounds from S
3 sec; S panting; then his tummy growls
2 sec during which S starts bouncing on the bed
5 sec while D gets the phone
2 sec; clicks of phone as S tries to get rid of it
clatters of phone; dog still barking
7 sec; clatters of phone; dog still barking
2 sec while S tries to hang phone up; then he immediately wants it again
7 sec as S fiddles with phone
note effortful construction of this utterance !
now ^when we hang it ^up we turn'it ^over
D getting bored , wants to put it away
^now we're gonna put'it a^way over ^here on the
^I don't like us ta be on'the ^phone ^all'la time
^I don't wantchu t'talk on the ^phone anymore
3 sec , then S makes a screechy noise of defiance at 7:07; 2 .5 sec silence
wants D to make the alarm clock buzz; 1 .5 sec
we always ^do this about seven o'clock
an' ^that's about the ^time it's set for in the ^morning
clock buzzes twince at 7:30 , then 2 sec silence
overlapped by 2 quick buzzes; 2 sec silence
you look like Don ^Ho with y'r ^tummy
like boots'on , socks'on in later tapes; 1 sec
4 sec while D pulls the curtains across
you wanna pull'the-- you wanna pull'the ^curtain
trying to distract S from curtain ?
starting a tg of war like they do when D dries Seth
drowned out by S's squealing and giggling which continues 4 .5 sec
shouting , then squeals; tape off/on at 0:27
S saying a:h as he pulls
do ^you liketa get ^under'em an' an' a^round'em
^I don't know if we oughta ^do this f'r'a long ^time
matter'a ^fact I don't wanna ^do it any ^more
put'em back ^up on this nice ^coffee tray
the previous utts were a bit whiny , the next one is assertive and singsong
same singsong as S; 2 sec , then S continues with singsong

crash at 2:21 as S pulls the clock off the table
9 sec while D picks up the clock

I'm gonna put'em back ^up-- on that ^hook
another crash at 2:54 as S knocks the clock off the table again
angry; 3 sec as D picks it up again
still frustrated and angry; 5 .5 sec as D continues picking it up

starts to fuss , his feelings are hurt
S starts to laugh , continues throughout next utts till 4:08
S giggles , says /n6n6/ and mumbles something else
yeah ^climb up there an' see that ^winda
